newsitem.title: CHINA: Guangzhou Shipyard wins orders to build two ships.
newsitem.headline: Guangzhou Shipyard wins orders to build two ships.

text.p: Guangzhou Shipyard International Co Ltd has won a contract to build two 27,000-tonne ships to carry timber for a domestic shipping line, a company official said on Friday.
Including this order, the company has ship-building contracts totalling 300,000 tonnes, which will give it work for the next two years, the official said.
He said the company expected turnover of more than two billion yuan in 1996, up from 1.83 billion yuan in 1995 but gave no more details.

In its interim report, the company posted net profit of 32.3 million yuan in the first half of 1996, down from 61.3 million yuan in the same 1995 period, with turnover of 896 million yuan, up from 849 million yuan.
